A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While visually stunning and generally entertaining\, the writing was extremely weak\, horrible pacing\, poorly timed jokes and a certain key character that they just got wrong for the first 90% of the movie. While I didn't hate it\, definitely left feeling very disappointed. The movie pretended as if it was going to take some big risks but chickened out of all of them at the end. Not as bad as phantom menace but nowhere near Empire strikes back\, not even as good as Force Awakens.
